discussion.p: The current standard does not have any constraints on const_sentinel template parameters, which makes it possible to pass almost any type of object to make_const_sentinel. It would be more appropriate to constrain the type to meet the minimum requirements of the sentinel type such as semiregular as move_sentinel does.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to the working draft snapshot from 2022-09-03.

blockquote.pre: template<semiregularclass S> using const_sentinel = see below;

blockquote.p: -2- Result: If S models input_iterator, const_iterator<S>. Otherwise, S.
